metadata.name: ALDO FT Event x @__meryanne__
metadata.description:
ALDOverse replenishes with its NFT collection dedicated to celebrating Finer Things and Emirati culture.

Leading global fashion footwear and accessories brand, ALDO announced esteemed Emirati Endurance Horse Rider, actress, and UAE Miss Universe 2021 finalist - MARWA AL HASHEMI - as the face of ALDO to launch The Finer Things Collection in the region. The Finer Things Collection is perfect for the festive season, including standout pieces, made with rich textures, to intricate, statement-making hardware.
